name: quinlaenar
text: I just. I'm FASCINATED by what these could be, with the whole [IMGS OFF] that I see any time someone used to have an image. I want to know, but I know I can't. It's MADDENING. And you even posted another for round 2! TELL ME NOW OR THE GIRL GETS IT!

text: I mean, what do you say to panel 4? What is the correct answer? Is that a binary true-false question?

name: quantumcasaba
text:
Damn it, every time I see asherdan say "'stad" I can't help but think of someone deucing on your kitchen floor that I have never seen. Thank you for that visceral image, for a corner of my mind is forever broken.
But in the good way?

name: epicurus
text: No prob', 'tumdude.

name: honesttom
text: I gave this a 5 as a belated birthday present.

name: phy
text: Everyone knows a cat that says that when you pick it up.

name: norrin
text: Most cats say it with their claws, though.

name: sexualhomeboy
text: My cat responds in exactly the same manner when I pick him up.  He has never offered me a Martini, though; and I'll be damned if he's going to wear a thong.  The glasses would be cool.

name: charchar
text: He picked up (and hugged ) a talking eyeless cat weaing a thong w/ a sewn-on tail and drinking a martiny (oh, i went here). Truly, Mr. Onstad, what the hell?

name: i_love_kate
text:
"Sewn-on tail?"

(Also chubbubied for "martiny".)

name: mattylite
text: God I love this one. And this one . Something about when they get picked up is just so great. I love how the Onstads in the final panels of each are identical (at least it seems like to me, I always sucked at those damn find-the-difference things in Highlights magazine at the dentist's office).

name: wonelove
text:
Onstad doesn't mind recieving alcohol from his cats on his birthday.

I don't think I'd mind, either.

name: buttermoths
text: But where does the glass go?

name: jonmw
text:
Ray is annoyed because Onstad did not use the correct technique:

I think that this might be a duplicate post, but I am not certain. Has there ever been a re-run of above strip?

name: nonentity
text: Whoa, is this a rerun strip, or is June 13th really Mr. Onstad's birthday? If so, I share a birthday with a SAINT.

name: theguitarhero
text: I would not admit to sharing a birthday with Saint.

name: carlyle
text: I don't think you know how to properly hold/pick up a cat, Onstad. Your techniwue is all wrong.

name: cagliostro
text: I shall be using 'techniwue' in future.

name: carlyle
text: Allow me to reference the panel that comes up when I mouse over your avatar and say I was running low on bromide at the time
